title: The 4 Things It Takes To Get Unstuck - Episode 70
itunes:title: The 4 Things It Takes To Get Unstuck - Episode 70
description:
Getting your church unstuck is possible. It's a process that takes time but is effective. Our team is always working on perfecting that process and we have just made it even better.

In this episode, Tony and Amy talk through our newly updated 4 Phase Process for getting churches unstuck and how this process can help your church accomplish its mission and help people take their next steps toward Jesus.

For more resources and to join the conversation, you can visit our show notes at theunstuckgroup.com/episode70.
content:encoded:
Getting your church unstuck is possible. It's a process that takes time but is effective. Our team is always working on perfecting that process and we have just made it even better.
